intro: A love triangle where romance and obsession mingle in a story of desire, manipulation and unexpected twists and turns.
description:
A young university student finds himself torn between two completely opposite girls: a childhood friend, with whom he shares memories of a quiet life and unfulfilled promises, and a mysterious girl, whose arrival shakes his world with intense and unknown emotions.

What begins as a sweet romance soon turns into a psychological struggle where the line between love and obsession becomes blurred. Every decision will affect not only their relationships, but also their perception of reality and the outcome of the story.

Can you uncover the truth before it's too late?
